messages.message: I like the pattern where user needs to click on the email or thread/channel to dismiss the visual indication. (curious if this is an easy lift or not? @Serena) I think I was trying to do something else and only saw the blue dots for a couple of seconds. They disappear before I can take any action. And I think for users seeing it for the first time, they probably aren't sure what that means either

the classification/reclassification progress should be visible on the bottom left with the file uploader component. so once all docs are done being classified you'd be able to see it in there (there's no modal or toast)
The problem is more when reclassification is done, it's hard to see what changed.
@Siya @Natasha letâ€™s deep dive on this in next weeks design review.
